name: Windfall
text: At the start of the Syndicate player's turn, gain 1 TG. Then return this card to the Syndicate player.

name: Strotemarket
text: At the start of your turn, you may spend 1 resource to place 1 destroyer or 2 fighters in a system that does not contain another player's ships. Then, return this card to the Raven player.

name: Deathstrike
text: At the start of a combat against the non-Terminator player, you may choose 1 enemy ship and destroy that unit.

name: Star Wars
text: After an opponent moves ships into a system that contains your units, you may fire SPACE CANNON 5 (x3), then return this card.
